Name: VR JAPAN
About the game: Immerse yourself in the world of Japanese space in VR for about 3 minutes.. This is a doorway connecting familiar Japanese scenery (alley, subway corridor, Japanese-style room, and temple). There is not much interactivity, so you can't grab things at the moment. Only teleportation move is supported. Enjoy a 3-minute walk in Japan!
Meta Title: VR JAPAN: Jan 8, 2021, Kraftmaru and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on VR JAPAN? Check out the release date (Jan 8, 2021), developer insights from Kraftmaru, and a complete game summary.
